alert.note: Alert for Ransom; Richland; Sargent (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 03 at 1:10PM CDT until April 03 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches possible through this afternoon, with localized higher totals. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Wilkin County. In North Dakota, Ransom, Sargent and Richland Counties. * WHEN...Until 4 PM CDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Brief bursts of heavier snow are possible, and where this occurs visibilities will be reduced to one quarter mile or less.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
